price: Akasema: Na nani anaye kata tamaa na rehema ya Mola wake Mlezi ila wale walio potea?
arabic: قَالَ وَمَن يَقۡنَطُ مِن رَّحۡمَةِ رَبِّهِۦٓ إِلَّا ٱلضَّآلُّونَ
footnotes: Ibrahim akasema: Mimi sikati tamaa na rehema ya Mwenyezi Mungu. Kwani hawakati tamaa na rehema ya Mwenyezi Mungu ila walio potea wasio utambua utukufu wake na uwezo wake.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: qāla waman yaqnaṭu min raḥmati rabbihi illā al-ḍālūna
